body: @DrinksandDame Thanks mate, for giving quick explanation. Thus it pick my curiosity.

Chapter 2 was mostly about the continuation of their banging from Ch 1. After fucking a lot, Blonde wanted to try to suck for the first time but she can't quite do it well so they offered to do raw sex instead. Teacher who? Sensei didn't  back down from that offer. Gotta punish Blonde for playing her fingers on his lust for her after all. Lots of hot scenes here. I especially like page 50 where her butt shakes as she takes it from the back. Anyway, as for where the story goes from here... Looks like Blonde plans to meet with the woman from the gravure company again to start her work so she asks Sensei to come too. TBC                       I already provided Ch 1 summary on the Ch 1 upload so I didn't put one here. In there, I forgot to mention that Sensei seems to have seen the woman from the gravure company before. As for where, we still don't know.
